thread.title: Backstage at Cirque Du Soleil's Amaluna
thread.title_full: Backstage at Cirque Du Soleil's Amaluna

title: Backstage at Cirque Du Soleil's Amaluna

locations.name: royal albert hall cirque du soliel

text: show ad Lifting the curtain on Cirque du Soleil: The costumes, greasepaint and hours of gruelling rehearsals that go into the visual spectacular as it marks 21 years at the Royal Albert Hall Cirque du Soliel has returned to the Royal Albert Hall for the 21st year with a stunning production of Amaluna Show immerses audiences in a fantastical world filled with characters who perform awe-inspiring acts Here FEMAIL reveals the hours of work devoted behind the scenes to bring the spectacle to life each night
